Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi ngempela sabahlalisa abantwana bakwa-Israyeli endaweni yokuhlala enhle futhi sababele ezintweni ezinhle, abazange baphikisane kwaze kwaba yilapho befikelwa khona ulwazi, ngempela iNkosi yakho iyohlulela phakathi kwabo ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo kulokho ababephikisana kukona
Uma ungabaza kulokhu esakwehlisela phansi kuwena ngakho- ke buza labo abayifundayo incwadi ngaphambilini kwakho ngempela lakufikela iqiniso elivela eNkosini yakho, ungabi ngomunye wabangabazayo
Futhi ungabi ngomunye walabo ababephika amavesi kaMvelinqangi ngokuba uzoba ngomunye wabalahlekelweyo
Ngempela labo elagcwaliseka kubona izwi leNkosi yakho, angeke bakholwe
Ngisho noma ngabe bangafikelwa yizona zonke izimpawu (angeke bakholwe), kuze kube babona isijeziso esibuhlungu

Ngakube lalikhona yini idolobha (umphakathi) owawukholwa kwawuzuzisa ukukholwa kwawo ngaphandle kwabantu bakaJona na? Ngenkathi sebekholwa sasisusa kubona isijeziso esiyihlazo empilweni yalomhlaba futhi sabanika injabulo yesikhashana
Futhi ukube iNkosi yakho yayithanda babezokholwa bonke abantu abasemhlabeni ngakube wena uphoqa abantu kuze kube bayakholwa na
Futhi akusikhona okomuntu ukuthi akholwe ngaphandle kwentando kaMvelinqangi futhi abeke intukuthelo phezulu kwalabo abangenawo umqondo
Ithi, “Bhekani ukuthi yini esemazulwini nasemhlabeni futhi angeke zibasize ngalutho izimpawu nabaxwayisi abantu abangakholwayo”
Ngakho-ke ngakube balindele (okunye) ngaphandle kokufana nezinsuku zalabo asebadlula ngaphambilini kwabo ithi, “lindani ngempela mina ngikanye nani kwabalindileyo”
Bese siyazisindisa izithunywa zethu kanye nalabo abakholwayo kanjalo-ke kungumthwalo kuthina ukuthi sisindise abakholwayo
